segments.source_content:
---
slug: /versioning
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Versioning

translations.zh-CN: # 版本管理

segments.source_content: You can use the versioning CLI to create a new documentation version based on the latest content in the `docs` directory. That specific set of documentation will then be preserved and accessible even as the documentation in the `docs` directory continues to evolve.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以使用版本管理CLI基于`docs`目录中的最新内容创建新的文档版本。该特定版本的文档将被保留并可访问，即使`docs`目录中的文档持续更新。

segments.source_content:
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_623f74e7

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Think about it before starting to version your documentation - it can become difficult for contributors to help improve it!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

在开始对文档进行版本管理前请三思——这会使贡献者难以协助改进文档！

:::

segments.source_content: Most of the time, you don't need versioning as it will just increase your build time, and introduce complexity to your codebase. Versioning is **best suited for websites with high-traffic and rapid changes to documentation between versions**. If your documentation rarely changes, don't add versioning to your documentation.

translations.zh-CN: 大多数情况下，您并不需要版本管理功能，因为这只会增加构建时间，并为代码库引入复杂性。版本管理**最适合文档版本间变更频繁且访问量高的网站**。如果您的文档很少变更，请不要为文档添加版本管理功能。

segments.source_content: To better understand how versioning works and see if it suits your needs, you can read on below.

translations.zh-CN: 要更好地理解版本管理的工作原理并判断其是否满足您的需求，请继续阅读下文。

segments.source_content: ## Overview {#overview}

translations.zh-CN: ## 概述 {#overview}

segments.source_content: A typical versioned doc site looks like below:

translations.zh-CN: 典型的版本化文档站点结构如下：

segments.source_content:
```bash
website
├── sidebars.json        # sidebar for the current docs version
├── docs                 # docs directory for the current docs version
│   ├── foo
│   │   └── bar.md       # https://mysite.com/docs/next/foo/bar
│   └── hello.md         # https://mysite.com/docs/next/hello
├── versions.json        # file to indicate what versions are available
├── versioned_docs
│   ├── version-1.1.0
│   │   ├── foo
│   │   │   └── bar.md   # https://mysite.com/docs/foo/bar
│   │   └── hello.md
│   └── version-1.0.0
│       ├── foo
│       │   └── bar.md   # https://mysite.com/docs/1.0.0/foo/bar
│       └── hello.md
├── versioned_sidebars
│   ├── version-1.1.0-sidebars.json
│   └── version-1.0.0-sidebars.json
├── docusaurus.config.js
└── package.json
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a89b882e

segments.source_content: The `versions.json` file is a list of version names, ordered from newest to oldest.

translations.zh-CN: `versions.json`文件是按从新到旧排序的版本名称列表。

segments.source_content: The table below explains how a versioned file maps to its version and the generated URL.

translations.zh-CN: 下表说明了版本化文件如何映射到其版本及生成的URL。

segments.source_content:
| Path                                    | Version        | URL               |
| --------------------------------------- | -------------- | ----------------- |
| `versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/hello.md` | 1.0.0          | /docs/1.0.0/hello |
| `versioned_docs/version-1.1.0/hello.md` | 1.1.0 (latest) | /docs/hello       |
| `docs/hello.md`                         | current        | /docs/next/hello  |

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_619c9033

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The files in the `docs` directory belong to the `current` docs version.

By default, the `current` docs version is labeled as `Next` and hosted under `/docs/next/*`, but it is entirely configurable to fit your project's release lifecycle.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

`docs`目录中的文件属于`current`文档版本。

默认情况下，`current`文档版本被标记为`Next`并托管在`/docs/next/*`路径下，但您完全可以配置它以适配项目的发布周期。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Terminology {#terminology}

translations.zh-CN: ### 术语说明 {#terminology}

segments.source_content: Note the terminology we use here.

translations.zh-CN: 请注意我们使用的术语。

segments.source_content:
Current version
{'The version placed in the '} ./docs {' folder.'}
Latest version / last version
{'The version served by default for docs navbar items. Usually has path '} /docs {'.'}

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5b035b90

segments.source_content: Current version is defined by the **file system location**, while latest version is defined by the **the navigation behavior**. They may or may not be the same version! (And the default configuration, as shown in the table above, would treat them as different: current version at `/docs/next` and latest at `/docs`.)

translations.zh-CN: 当前版本由**文件系统位置**定义，而最新版本由**导航行为**定义。它们可能是同一个版本，也可能不是！（如上表所示的默认配置就将它们视为不同版本：当前版本在`/docs/next`，最新版本在`/docs`。）

segments.source_content: ## Tutorials {#tutorials}

translations.zh-CN: ## 操作指南 {#tutorials}

segments.source_content: ### Tagging a new version {#tagging-a-new-version}

translations.zh-CN: ### 标记新版本 {#tagging-a-new-version}

segments.source_content:
1. First, make sure the current docs version (the `./docs` directory) is ready to be frozen.
2. Enter a new version number.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 首先确保当前文档版本（`./docs`目录）已准备好冻结
2. 输入新版本号

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run docusaurus docs:version 1.1.0
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_dc73c0d2

segments.source_content: When tagging a new version, the document versioning mechanism will:

translations.zh-CN: 标记新版本时，文档版本管理机制将执行以下操作：

segments.source_content:
- Copy the full `docs/` folder contents into a new `versioned_docs/version-[versionName]/` folder.
- Create a versioned sidebars file based from your current [sidebar](./sidebar/index.mdx) configuration (if it exists) - saved as `versioned_sidebars/version-[versionName]-sidebars.json`.
- Append the new version number to `versions.json`.

translations.zh-CN:
- 将`docs/`文件夹完整内容复制到新目录`versioned_docs/version-[versionName]/`
- 根据当前[侧边栏](./sidebar/index.mdx)配置（如果存在）创建版本化侧边栏文件——保存为`versioned_sidebars/version-[versionName]-sidebars.json`
- 将新版本号追加到`versions.json`文件中

segments.source_content: ### Creating new docs {#creating-new-docs}

translations.zh-CN: ### 创建新文档 {#creating-new-docs}

segments.source_content:
1. Place the new file into the corresponding version folder.
2. Include the reference to the new file in the corresponding sidebar file according to the version number.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 将新文件放入对应版本的文件夹
2. 根据版本号在对应的侧边栏文件中添加新文件的引用

segments.source_content:
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="Current version structure">

```bash
# The new file.
docs/new.md

# Edit the corresponding sidebar file.
sidebars.js
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="Older version structure">

```bash
# The new file.
versioned_docs/version-1.0.0/new.md

# Edit the corresponding sidebar file.
versioned_sidebars/version-1.0.0-sidebars.json
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f018dbb4

segments.source_content: ### Updating an existing version {#updating-an-existing-version}

translations.zh-CN: ### 更新现有版本 {#updating-an-existing-version}

segments.source_content: You can update multiple docs versions at the same time because each directory in `versioned_docs/` represents specific routes when published.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以同时更新多个文档版本，因为`versioned_docs/`中的每个目录在发布时都对应特定的路由。

segments.source_content:
1. Edit any file.
2. Commit and push changes.
3. It will be published to the version.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 编辑任意文件。
2. 提交并推送更改。
3. 变更将发布到对应版本。

segments.source_content: Example: When you change any file in `versioned_docs/version-2.6/`, it will only affect the docs for version `2.6`.

translations.zh-CN: 示例：当您修改 `versioned_docs/version-2.6/` 目录下的文件时，仅会影响版本 `2.6` 的文档。

segments.source_content: ### Deleting an existing version {#deleting-an-existing-version}

translations.zh-CN: ### 删除现有版本 {#deleting-an-existing-version}

segments.source_content: You can delete/remove versions as well.

translations.zh-CN: 您也可以删除/移除版本。

segments.source_content: 1. Remove the version from `versions.json`.

translations.zh-CN: 1. 从 `versions.json` 中移除目标版本。

segments.source_content: Example:

translations.zh-CN: 示例：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_bea1601a

segments.source_content:
2. Delete the versioned docs directory. Example: `versioned_docs/version-1.8.0`.
3. Delete the versioned sidebars file. Example: `versioned_sidebars/version-1.8.0-sidebars.json`.

translations.zh-CN:
2. 删除版本化文档目录。示例：`versioned_docs/version-1.8.0`。
3. 删除版本化侧边栏文件。示例：`versioned_sidebars/version-1.8.0-sidebars.json`。

segments.source_content: ## Configuring versioning behavior {#configuring-versioning-behavior}

translations.zh-CN: ## 配置版本化行为 {#configuring-versioning-behavior}

segments.source_content: The "current" version is the version name for the `./docs` folder. There are different ways to manage versioning, but two very common patterns are:

translations.zh-CN: "当前"版本是指 `./docs` 文件夹对应的版本名称。版本管理有多种方式，但两种最常见模式是：

segments.source_content:
- You release v1, and start immediately working on v2 (including its docs). In this case, the **current version** is v2, which is in the `./docs` source folder, and can be browsed at `example.com/docs/next`. The **latest version** is v1, which is in the `./versioned_docs/version-1` source folder, and is browsed by most of your users at `example.com/docs`.
- You release v1, and will maintain it for some time before thinking about v2. In this case, the **current version** and **latest version** will both be point to v1, since the v2 docs doesn't even exist yet!

translations.zh-CN:
- 发布 v1 后立即开始开发 v2（包括其文档）。此时**当前版本**是 v2（存放在 `./docs` 源文件夹），可通过 `example.com/docs/next` 访问；**最新版本**是 v1（存放在 `./versioned_docs/version-1` 源文件夹），大多数用户通过 `example.com/docs` 访问。
- 发布 v1 后将持续维护一段时间再考虑 v2。此时**当前版本**和**最新版本**都指向 v1，因为 v2 文档尚未存在！

segments.source_content: Docusaurus defaults work great for the first use case. We will label the current version as "next" and you can even choose not to publish it.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 的默认配置非常适合第一种场景。我们会将当前版本标记为 "next"，您甚至可以选择不发布它。

segments.source_content: **For the 2nd use case**: if you release v1 and don't plan to work on v2 anytime soon, instead of versioning v1 and having to maintain the docs in 2 folders (`./docs` + `./versioned_docs/version-1.0.0`), you may consider "pretending" that the current version is a cut version by giving it a path and a label:

translations.zh-CN: **对于第二种场景**：如果发布 v1 后短期内不计划开发 v2，与其为 v1 创建版本并维护两个文件夹（`./docs` + `./versioned_docs/version-1.0.0`），您可以通过指定路径和标签来"伪装"当前版本为已发布版本：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f377fafa

segments.source_content: The docs in `./docs` will be served at `/docs/1.0.0` instead of `/docs/next`, and `1.0.0` will become the default version we link to in the navbar dropdown, and you will only need to maintain a single `./docs` folder.

translations.zh-CN: 这样 `./docs` 中的文档将通过 `/docs/1.0.0` 而非 `/docs/next` 提供服务，`1.0.0` 将成为导航栏下拉菜单的默认链接版本，您只需维护单个 `./docs` 文件夹。

segments.source_content: We offer these plugin options to customize versioning behavior:

translations.zh-CN: 我们提供以下插件选项来自定义版本化行为：

segments.source_content:
- `disableVersioning`: Explicitly disable versioning even with versions. This will make the site only include the current version.
- `includeCurrentVersion`: Include the current version (the `./docs` folder) of your docs.
  - **Tip**: turn it off if the current version is a work-in-progress, not ready to be published.
- `lastVersion`: Sets which version "latest version" (the `/docs` route) refers to.
  - **Tip**: `lastVersion: 'current'` makes sense if your current version refers to a major version that's constantly patched and released. The actual route base path and label of the latest version are configurable.
- `onlyIncludeVersions`: Defines a subset of versions from `versions.json` to be deployed.
  - **Tip**: limit to 2 or 3 versions in dev and deploy previews to improve startup and build time.
- `versions`: A dictionary of version metadata. For each version, you can customize the following:
  - `label`: the label displayed in the versions dropdown and banner.
  - `path`: the route base path of this version. By default, latest version has `/` and current version has `/next`.
  - `banner`: one of `'none'`, `'unreleased'`, and `'unmaintained'`. Determines what's displayed at the top of every doc page. Any version above the latest version would be "unreleased", and any version below would be "unmaintained".
  - `badge`: show a badge with the version name at the top of a doc of that version.
  - `className`: add a custom `className` to the `<html>` element of doc pages of that version.

translations.zh-CN:
- `disableVersioning`: 显式禁用版本化，即使存在多个版本。这将使站点仅包含当前版本。
- `includeCurrentVersion`: 包含当前版本（即 `./docs` 文件夹）的文档。
  - **提示**：如果当前版本是开发中的未完成版本，可关闭此选项以避免发布。
- `lastVersion`: 设置"最新版本"（即 `/docs` 路由）指向的版本。
  - **提示**：当当前版本指向持续修补和发布的主版本时，`lastVersion: 'current'` 是合理配置。最新版本的实际路由基础路径和标签均可配置。
- `onlyIncludeVersions`: 定义从 `versions.json` 中部署的版本子集。
  - **提示**：在开发和部署预览中限制为2-3个版本可提升启动和构建速度。
- `versions`: 版本元数据字典。每个版本可配置以下属性：
  - `label`: 版本下拉菜单和横幅中显示的标签。
  - `path`: 该版本的路由基础路径。默认最新版本为 `/`，当前版本为 `/next`。
  - `banner`: 可选 `'none'`、`'unreleased'` 或 `'unmaintained'`。决定每个文档页面顶部显示的内容。比最新版本高的版本标记为"unreleased"，低的标记为"unmaintained"。
  - `badge`: 在该版本文档顶部显示版本名称徽章。
  - `className`: 为该版本文档页面的 `<html>` 元素添加自定义类名。

segments.source_content: See [docs plugin configuration](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#configuration) for more details.

translations.zh-CN: 详见[文档插件配置](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#configuration)获取更多细节。

segments.source_content: ## Navbar items {#navbar-items}

translations.zh-CN: ## 导航栏项目 {#navbar-items}

segments.source_content: We offer several docs navbar items to help you quickly set up navigation without worrying about versioned routes.

translations.zh-CN: 我们提供多种文档导航栏项目，帮助您快速建立导航而无需考虑版本化路由。

segments.source_content:
- [`doc`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-doc-link): a link to a doc.
- [`docSidebar`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-doc-sidebar): a link to the first item in a sidebar.
- [`docsVersion`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version): a link to the main doc of the currently viewed version.
- [`docsVersionDropdown`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version-dropdown): a dropdown containing all the versions available.

translations.zh-CN:
- [`doc`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-doc-link): 指向单个文档的链接
- [`docSidebar`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-doc-sidebar): 指向侧边栏首项的链接
- [`docsVersion`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version): 指向当前查看版本主文档的链接
- [`docsVersionDropdown`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version-dropdown): 包含所有可用版本的下拉菜单

segments.source_content: These links would all look for an appropriate version to link to, in the following order:

translations.zh-CN: 这些链接会按以下顺序寻找合适的版本进行跳转：

segments.source_content:
1. **Active version**: the version that the user is currently browsing, if she is on a page provided by this doc plugin. If she's not on a doc page, fall back to...
2. **Preferred version**: the version that the user last viewed. If there's no history, fall back to...
3. **Latest version**: the default version that we navigate to, configured by the `lastVersion` option.

translations.zh-CN:
1. **活跃版本**：用户当前浏览的版本（如果正在访问该文档插件提供的页面）。若非文档页面，则回退到...
2. **偏好版本**：用户上次查看的版本。若无历史记录，则回退到...
3. **最新版本**：通过 `lastVersion` 选项配置的默认跳转版本。

segments.source_content: ## `docsVersionDropdown` {#docsVersionDropdown}

translations.zh-CN: ## `docsVersionDropdown` {#docsVersionDropdown}

segments.source_content: By default, the [`docsVersionDropdown`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version-dropdown) displays a dropdown with all the available docs versions.

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下，[`docsVersionDropdown`](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar-docs-version-dropdown) 会显示包含所有可用文档版本的下拉菜单。

segments.source_content: The `versions` attribute allows you to display a subset of the available docs versions in a given order:

translations.zh-CN: 通过 `versions` 属性可控制显示版本子集及其排序：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_d76894b4

segments.source_content: Passing a `versions` object, lets you override the display label of each version:

translations.zh-CN: 传入 `versions` 对象可覆盖每个版本的显示标签：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ca8f8565

segments.source_content: ## Recommended practices {#recommended-practices}

translations.zh-CN: ## 推荐实践 {#recommended-practices}

segments.source_content: ### Version your documentation only when needed {#version-your-documentation-only-when-needed}

translations.zh-CN: ### 仅在必要时进行文档版本化 {#version-your-documentation-only-when-needed}

segments.source_content: For example, you are building documentation for your npm package `foo` and you are currently in version 1.0.0. You then release a patch version for a minor bug fix and it's now 1.0.1.

translations.zh-CN: 例如：您正在为 npm 包 `foo` 构建文档，当前版本为 1.0.0。随后发布了一个小错误修复的补丁版本 1.0.1。

segments.source_content: Should you cut a new documentation version 1.0.1? **You probably shouldn't**. 1.0.1 and 1.0.0 docs shouldn't differ according to semver because there are no new features!. Cutting a new version for it will only just create unnecessary duplicated files.

translations.zh-CN: 是否需要为此创建新的文档版本 1.0.1？**通常不需要**。根据语义化版本规范，1.0.1 和 1.0.0 的文档不应存在差异（因为没有新功能）。为此创建新版本只会产生不必要的文件重复。

segments.source_content: ### Keep the number of versions small {#keep-the-number-of-versions-small}

translations.zh-CN: ### 控制版本数量 {#keep-the-number-of-versions-small}

segments.source_content: As a good rule of thumb, try to keep the number of your versions below 10. You will **very likely** to have a lot of obsolete versioned documentation that nobody even reads anymore. For example, [Jest](https://jestjs.io/versions) is currently in version `27.4`, and only maintains several latest documentation versions with the lowest being `25.X`. Keep it small 😊

translations.zh-CN: 作为最佳实践，建议将文档版本数量控制在10个以下。**极有可能**你会发现大量过时的版本化文档根本无人阅读。例如[Jest](https://jestjs.io/versions)当前版本为`27.4`，但仅维护包括最低版本`25.X`在内的几个最新文档版本。保持精简 😊

segments.source_content:
:::tip[archive older versions]

If you deploy your site on a Jamstack provider (e.g. [Netlify](../../deployment.mdx)), the provider will save each production build as a snapshot under an immutable URL. You can include archived versions that will never be rebuilt as external links to these immutable URLs. The Jest website and the Docusaurus website both use such pattern to keep the number of actively built versions low.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[归档旧版本]

如果你在Jamstack提供商（如[Netlify](../../deployment.mdx)）上部署站点，服务商会将每次生产构建作为快照保存在不可变URL下。你可以将不再重建的归档版本作为外部链接指向这些不可变URL。Jest官网和Docusaurus官网都采用这种模式来减少活跃构建的版本数量。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Use absolute import within the docs {#use-absolute-import-within-the-docs}

translations.zh-CN: ### 在文档中使用绝对路径导入 {#use-absolute-import-within-the-docs}

segments.source_content: Don't use relative paths import within the docs. Because when we cut a version the paths no longer work (the nesting level is different, among other reasons). You can utilize the `@site` alias provided by Docusaurus that points to the `website` directory. Example:

translations.zh-CN: 不要在文档中使用相对路径导入。因为当我们创建新版本时这些路径会失效（嵌套层级变化等原因）。可以使用Docusaurus提供的指向`website`目录的`@site`别名。示例：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_50bd5256

segments.source_content: ### Link docs by file paths {#link-docs-by-file-paths}

translations.zh-CN: ### 通过文件路径链接文档 {#link-docs-by-file-paths}

segments.source_content: Refer to other docs by relative file paths with the `.md` extension, so that Docusaurus can rewrite them to actual URL paths during building. Files will be linked to the correct corresponding version.

translations.zh-CN: 通过带`.md`扩展名的相对文件路径引用其他文档，这样Docusaurus在构建时能将其重写为实际URL路径。文件将被正确链接到对应版本。

segments.source_content:
```md
The [@hello](hello.mdx#paginate) document is great!

See the [Tutorial](../getting-started/tutorial.mdx) for more info.
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3dc11e28

segments.source_content: ### Global or versioned collocated assets {#global-or-versioned-collocated-assets}

translations.zh-CN: ### 全局或版本化关联资源 {#global-or-versioned-collocated-assets}

segments.source_content: You should decide if assets like images and files are per-version or shared between versions.

translations.zh-CN: 你需要决定如图片等资源是按版本隔离还是跨版本共享。

segments.source_content: If your assets should be versioned, put them in the docs version, and use relative paths:

translations.zh-CN: 若资源需要版本化，请将其放入对应版本的docs目录，并使用相对路径：

segments.source_content:
```md
![img alt](./myImage.png)

[download this file](./file.pdf)
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_21658060

segments.source_content: If your assets are global, put them in `/static` and use absolute paths:

translations.zh-CN: 若资源是全局性的，请将其放入`/static`目录并使用绝对路径：

segments.source_content:
```md
![img alt](/myImage.png)

[download this file](/file.pdf)
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_96757ef3
